function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate control of pressure differences between zones in the building.","Impact":"Uncontrolled air flow from unsafe areas to safe areas, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Implement proper control measures for pressure differences between zones.","Technologies":"HVAC control systems for managing pressure differences.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff.","Owner":"HVAC maintenance and management team."},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation of spaces with outdoor air.","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality and increased risk of airborne transmission of diseases.","Mitigation":"Increase outdoor air supply and maintain or increase social distancing.","Technologies":"HVAC systems with outdoor air intakes and air distribution systems.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff.","Owner":"Facilities management team."},{"Description":"Inadequate use of UV-C for air sterilization.","Impact":"Insufficient virus inactivation and increased risk of disease transmission through air.","Mitigation":"Install and use UV-C systems with appropriate wavelengths for air sterilization.","Technologies":"UV-C air sterilization systems.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff.","Owner":"HVAC maintenance and management team."}]}
